{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/iterator/title | operator[]}}
{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++23 | 1=
constexpr auto operator[]( difference_type n ) const
    requires /*all-random-access*/&lt;Const, Views...&gt;;
}}

Obtains a {{lc|std::tuple}} that consists of underlying pointed-to elements at given offset relative to current location.

Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
return /*tuple-transform*/([&amp;]&lt;class I&gt;(I&amp; i) -&gt; decltype(auto) {
           return i[iter_difference_t&lt;I&gt;(n)];
       }, current_);
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | n | position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The obtained tuple-like element.
